title: Requires posting of police department telephone numbers on pay telephones
summary: Requires that all telephone corporations doing business in the state and providing pay telephones shall conspicuously post the name and telephone number of the local police precinct, agency or department on all telephones located in the state; directs the public service commission to promulgate rules and regulations necessary for the proper application, administration and enforcement of such requirement.

       Introduced  by  Sen.  KRUGER -- read twice and ordered printed, and when
         printed to be committed to the Committee on Consumer Protection

       AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to posting  police
         department telephone numbers on pay telephones

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1.   The general business law  is  amended  by  adding  a  new
    2  section 336-c to read as follows:
    3    S  336-C.  POSTING OF POLICE DEPARTMENT TELEPHONE NUMBERS ON PAY TELE-
    4  PHONES. 1. ALL TELEPHONE CORPORATIONS DOING BUSINESS IN  THE  STATE  AND
    5  PROVIDING PAY TELEPHONES SHALL CONSPICUOUSLY POST THE NAME AND TELEPHONE
    6  NUMBER  OF  THE  LOCAL POLICE PRECINCT, AGENCY OR DEPARTMENT ON ALL SUCH
    7  TELEPHONES LOCATED IN THIS STATE.
    8    2. THE PUBLIC SERVICE COMMISSION SHALL PROMULGATE THE RULES AND  REGU-
    9  LATIONS   NECESSARY  FOR  THE  PROPER  APPLICATION,  ADMINISTRATION  AND
   10  ENFORCEMENT OF SUBDIVISION ONE OF THIS SECTION.
   11    S 2. This act shall take effect on the one hundred eightieth day after
   12  it shall have become a law; provided, however, that the  public  service
   13  commission  shall  promulgate  the  rules  and  regulations necessary to
   14  effectuate the provisions of this act prior to such effective date.




        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
